about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting world of Moonstone Remix — an old-school MMORPG that's a game within a game! Befriend or romance the vast set of characters you will meet in this game.

Begin your adventure by creating a character and exploring the bustling hub town. Here, you'll encounter a diverse set of characters who can assist you in raiding the available dungeons. Recruit them to your clan and get to know them. If they like you enough, you can invite them over to Chaos Chat, a chat-simulation segment where you'll discover more about their lives, quirks, and share silly stories that keep you up all night. But it doesn't stop there; love can blossom between the both of you. When love is in the air, they might just meet up with you in person.

Whether you seek lasting friendships or passionate love, it's all your choice.



Make your character yours! Whether you like to self-insert or create your own original character, almost anything is possible here. Customize your appearance, select your preferred pronouns, and even curate your own selection of emojis for the Chaos Chat app. Immerse yourself in this virtual realm and express your personality through numerous in-game dialogue options.


Friendship is the foundation of Moonstone Remix, whether they are a main character, or a minor character in the background. If a particular character captures your heart, you're free to pursue a romance with one of the main cast of characters. Even minor characters have the possibility of getting their own romance route.


Moonstone Remix is in early development and any images shown are not final.
